top_comments.comment: You know what I was in a holding cell once and I would have loved one if those dorms in comparison, get out of your ivory tower Hayes!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hey Fox Nation has almost Doubled their Subscriber numbers. Most want to see the Tucker Documentary. And there will be tens of thousands of Americans that will be riposting it to YouTube.
It Is elder abuse to have this man be President of the United States at this point.
